title: Ceremonial Warhammer
content:
olding it.

Following tradition, this hammer's faces were forged with grooves that sealed in the blood of its first kill.

Ceremonial Warhammer Location & Where to Find

Location: On top of Rosymorn Monastery in the Giant Eagle's nest.

Ceremonial Warhammer Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 500 Gp. Weight: 2.7 Kg. ID:

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ Artif
